words.def: the state of having committed an offense
the quality of being so overabundant that prices fall
a coating of gold or of something that looks like gold
the basic unit of money in Lithuania
the part of the alimentary canal between the stomach and the anus
a person who is deemed to be despicable or contemptible
the humanistic study of a body of literature
A New Zealand  honeyeater, Prosthemadera novaeseelandiae .
a soft silver-white univalent element of the alkali metal group
the local time at the 0 meridian passing through Greenwich, England
a light strong grey lustrous corrosion-resistant metallic element used in strong lightweight alloys (as for airplane parts)
the branch of engineering that deals with the use of computers and telecommunications to retrieve and store and transmit information
